title: American Horror Story: Hotel Soundtrack | 47. Giorgio Moroder - Knights In White Satin
author: American Horror Story Brasil
comment: Lost my shit when i realized what song this was
I'll be damned. I recognized that melody in the show, knew it was Nights in White Satin. Holy fuuuck.
Yaaas Giorgio !! hope he & Gaga works together <3
When this came up on Hotel I lost it!!! I love this song so much. It comes in 3 parts on the album.
description:
EPISODE 5.12 SEASON FINALE -  Be Our Guest

Liz chega na reunião da WD, a empresa de Will Drake e avisa que Will a deu poderes de representá-lo e que ela vai ser a noca CEO da empresa; Os fantasmas desfilam para WD. | Liz walks into the board room of WD and announce that Will have given her the power to speak for him and that she'll be the new CEO of the company now; Liz helps Will reinvent the fashion house. After becoming CEO of WD, Liz works with Will to bring the fashion house back to it glory; the ghosts of the Cortez become the model of WD and walk the runaways for the fashion line. 

We don't own the rights for this song, it belongs to its rightful owners. 
Se tiver gostado do vídeo, não se esqueça de clicar no joinha e se inscreva no canal para receber mais! Siga-nos nas redes sociais! | If you liked this video, thumbs up and subscribe for more videos! Follow us on social media!
